markdownRemark.html: A boutique travel agency run by a team of Spaniards with extensive experience in promoting the gastronomy and gourmet foods from Spain. Private culinary tours, traditional and avant-garde cooking classes, wine and olive oil tastings, tapas tours and other customized gourmet activities, and many more bespoke ranges of activities are organised by this company. A Taste of Spain is recommended by National Geographic on "Food Journeys of a lifetime"

frontmatter.title: A Taste of Spain
